language.entry: Drains the life force from enemies. Has a chance to instantly kill the target. On hit, heals 7 HP and reduces stress by 10. Inflicts bleeding damage over time.
Transforms the body into an unbreakable beryl crystal, providing powerful defensive buffs.
Unleashes the terrifying cry of a banshee, stunning enemies and weakening their resolve.
The Goal of All Life is Death
The ultimate death spell. Pulls enemies into the abyss and inflicts deadly poison that represents the inevitability of death.
The Goal of All Life is Death
